title: Similar to T-Star Mono Round
content: Hi, Im looking for something similar to Similar to T-Star Mono Round, or even T-Star Mono Round if someone wants to kindly send me a copy ( [admrobbins88@gmail.com](mailto:admrobbins88@gmail.com)). Any suggestions?
author: adrobbins

comments.content: What’s wrong with T-Star Mono?
This is not the place to ask for pirated fonts :)
Nothings wrong with it other than the cost. (Im a 3rd year undergraduate). And im not directly asking for hooky fonts.

What do you think about [Miso](http://web.archive.org/web/20130427133055/http:/omkrets.se/typografi/)? Three weights, in OpenType. And it’s free.  
F
I think I've struck gold. Thank you.
I was going to suggest Miso but thought it wasn’t T-Starish enough.
Its narrow, which I like, but it misses some of those square arms and beaks. Im a fan of chevin which is away from T-star but I've used in my final major and can't really see it washing on my site.

Have you thought about Helvetica or Tahoma ?! They are both narrow and also have the arms and beaks you are looking for...if all else fails i suggest using comic sans? easy, simple and always very effective!
oh no.
your an idiot my friend.
How am I an idiot you tosser? Your website will look shite if you use Miso - its a free font for \*\*\*\* sakes!

Other than the worlds most over used typeface and the rather dated tahoma would you like to embarrass yourself further fontmaster and make some more suggestions.

ps - I didn't forget you mentioned comic sans, I merely ignored it.

Over-used - hmm well i wonder why that is "adrobbins"...because its a great typeface - and to be honest do you really think word would be using it if it wasnt!? i think i have made my point...other suggestions...Baskerville Old Face or perhaps Palatino?  
And dont get smart - you havent even graduated yet you mug...

So your alternative suggestions so far to T-Star Mono Round are:

Helvetica  
Tahoma  
Comic Sans  
Baskerville Old Face  
and finally Platino.

What \*\*\*\*in industry have you been in for 15 years.

THANK YOU!!

Look at the end of the day adrobbins your clearly a little jumped up pretentious prick who has probably downloaded a stupid amount of fonts and worked your way through them memorizing the names...at least my fonts are proven to work...stick to Miso mate and watch the big fat 3rd appear on your degree....complete tosser...
someone please back me up here?
someone please back me up here?
What's with the attitude, fontmaster?
This isn't the place for personal attacks or bad language. Be nice please.

And of course you bought a licence for Chevin?

Nick Cooke
Sorry guys - had a few beers last night!
